scripts.codegen: cross-env-shell CARGO_NET_GIT_FETCH_WITH_CLI=true CARGO_TARGET_DIR=../../rust_target cargo test codegen_bindings::generate  -- --exact
scripts._build_: cross-env-shell RUSTFLAGS=-Csymbol-mangling-version=v0 CARGO_TARGET_DIR=../../rust_target CARGO_NET_GIT_FETCH_WITH_CLI=true napi build --dts index.d.ts --release
scripts._dev_: cross-env-shell CARGO_NET_GIT_FETCH_WITH_CLI=true CARGO_TARGET_DIR=../../rust_target napi build --dts index.d.ts
